long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stickman Fight: Ragdoll for Chrome Extension is an exciting online game that can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.
Stickman Fight: Ragdoll is a thrilling skill game where players control a floppy stickman ragdoll in intense battles against both enemies and the laws of physics. The objective is to master the art of using your ragdoll's body to attack with precision and power. As you progress, you can level up your weapons and armor using the coins earned from each fight. The challenge lies in taking down as many enemies as possible while navigating the chaotic physics-based environment. Players can enjoy this game for free on the Classroom 6x website.

*Note:We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
